AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter butcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: In all honesty, [PAWN_nameDef] just really enjoyed stabbing people, and was rather proficient at it. So proficient in fact that [PAWN_pronoun] easily became part of the Keel Cutters, and wound up becoming a sort of torturer for them.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter ravager
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: For [PAWN_nameDef], there was no better feeling in the world than the feeling of metal slicing through flesh. Luckily, life in the Keel Cutters provided ample opportunities for this.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter champion
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Once an elite member of the Pyandonean Armada, [PAWN_nameDef] was stripped of [PAWN_possessive] position after an unfortunate incident. [PAWN_possessive] 'retirement' didn't last for long though, as [PAWN_nameDef] was quickly recruited by the Keel Cutters, who were rather impressed with the rumors they had heard.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter thundermaul
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While [PAWN_nameDef] always had some slight magical skills, and a bit of an affinity towards lightning magic, [PAWN_pronoun] did also just enjoy smashing things with a big maul. The Keel Cutters didn't mind this, and in fact actively encouraged it, which made [PAWN_nameDef] feel right at home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter archer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: While the pirates of the Keel Cutters greatly preferred feeling someones limb separating from their body, some such as [PAWN_nameDef] liked to keep a respectable distance from their foes. This preference did come in handy when someone tried running away, while others would have to chase after them, [PAWN_nameDef] would just ready an arrow.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter vanquisher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] always thought it was strange that [PAWN_pronoun] fellow Keel Cutters limited themselves so much. [PAWN_pronoun] knew that anyone with half a brain had a sword for stabbing people up close, and some javelins for anyone that tries to run away.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter mender
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Pirates of the Keel Cutters were quite ruthless, and often wound up with several injuries after a skirmish. So they recruited [PAWN_nameDef], a reasonably skilled healer with no moral quandaries.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter sea lord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: As a rather skilled storm mage, [PAWN_nameDef] commands a rather generous amount of respect. Sadly, [PAWN_pronoun] didn't quite feel respected enough in the Storm Sharks, and decided to set out on [PAWN_possessive] own. [PAWN_nameDef] wound up joining the Keel Cutters, who [PAWN_pronoun] made sure respected [PAWN_objective].

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Keel Cutter captain
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] once ruled the Keel Cutters with a lightning clad fist. Under [PAWN_pronoun] command the hauls were glorious, and the bloodshed exquisite. Though eventually [PAWN_nameDef] grew tired of the costant violence, and decided to gaze upon other shores by [PAWN_objective]self.
